TopicTitle: Things that could have a revamp.

Articles.Content:
Today i decided to delete a bunch of quicksaves ,

1 . Please make it possible to select more then 1 file for deletion , instead of select file , click delete , confirm ,select file , click delete , confirm ,select file , click delete , confirm ,select file , click delete , confirm ,select file , click delete , confirm , and so on.

i thought to be smart and go to the saved files directory and delete em there ( which i did ) But the game decided to put all saves back without even asking.

2. this one is also simple : organize file display like a normal list  , 1 , 2 , 3 and so on  , not like it is now 1,10,100,101

3. Bonus would be to be able to reverse the displayed list > high to low.

4. i have serious problems trying to select the object i want when in orbit mode , especially when docking or undocking, 99% of the time i have to go to tracking station to select the object i want to control.

 

now back to upgrading my Min station

greets Sixer
They could revamp Kerbol textures and add some animations for it, like solar wind.
They could make clouds a stock thing...
